categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Rotham was a male Sith Warrior who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. When the Mandalorian Clan Varad seized the Republic warship Allusis, Rotham was selected by Darth Malgus alongside the Sith Inquisitor Vincine, a bounty hunter named Kyrenic, and the Imperial agent Andan to form a strike team to capture the vessel. However, the team encounter opposition in the form of a Republic strike team, and only one of the two groups survived their conflict.
